about_the_game:
Get lost in the heartfelt world of Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake with an all-new soundtrack. Based on the original score by Gustaf Grefberg, this stunning soundtrack features 10 reworked arrangements and 15 all-new tracks by Daniele Carmosino and Christof Unterberger.

Track List:
1. Brothers, A Tale Of Two Sons
2. Tragedy At The Sea
3. Father Is Sick
4. The Village
5. Woods
6. An Unfriendly Dog
7. Unexpected Help
8. The Troll Cave
9. Finally Outside
10. Father's Theme
11. Wilderness
12. Don't Trust Those Roots
13. Mother's Dream
14. Mountains
15. Wings Of Hope
16. Father's Theme (Feather Version)
17. Dead Giant's Battlefield
18. Frozen Land
19. The Hidden Menace
20. The Spider Nest
21. The Tree Of Life
22. The Climb
23. Naia
24. Lonely Way Back
25. Heading Home
